overview.summary: Reports requested information about a attached database. This class cannot be inherited.

constructor.name: ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the FbDatabaseInfo class.

constructor.name: ctor(FbConnection)
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the FbDatabaseInfo class with an object.

property.name: Connection
property.summary: Gets or sets the used by this instance of the FbDataseInfo.
property.value: The connection to a data source. The default is a null value.

property.name: IscVersion
property.summary: Gets the version identification string of the database implementation.

property.name: ServerVersion
property.summary: Gets the version identification string of the Firebird Server.

property.name: ServerClass
property.summary: Gets wheter Firebird Server is a Super or Classic server.

property.name: PageSize
property.summary: Gets the page size of the database.

property.name: OdsVersion
property.summary: Gets the ODS major version number.

remarks.p: • Databases with different major version numbers have different physical layouts; a database engine can only access databases with a particular ODS major version number.
• Trying to attach to a database with a different ODS number results in an error.

property.name: OdsMinorVersion
property.summary: Gets the On-disk structure (ODS) minor version number.
property.remarks: An increase in a minor version number indicates a non-structural change, one that still allows the database to be accessed by database engines with the same major version number but possibly different minor version numbers.

property.name: MaxMemory
property.summary: Gest the Maximum amount of memory (in bytes) used at one time since the first process attached to the database.

property.name: CurrentMemory
property.summary: Gest the Amount of server memory (in bytes) currently in use.

property.name: NumBuffers
property.summary: Gest the number of memory buffers currently allocated.

property.name: ReadOnly
property.summary: Gets wheter database is in readonly mode.

property.name: AllocationPages
property.summary: Gest the number of database pages allocated.

property.name: BaseLevel
property.summary: Gest the database version (level) number.

property.name: DbId
property.summary: Gest the database file name and site name.

property.name: Implementation
property.summary: Gest the database implementation number.

property.name: ForcedWrites
property.summary: Gest the mode in which database writes are performed.
property.value: true if database is in forced writes mode; false if not.

property.name: NoReserve
property.summary: Gest the indicates if space is reserved on each database page for holding.
property.value: true if the space is reserved; false if not.

property.name: SweepInterval
property.summary: Gest the number of transactions that are committed between “sweeps” to remove database record versions that are no longer needed.

property.name: Fetches
property.summary: Gest the number of reads from the memory buffer cache.

property.name: Marks
property.summary: Gest the number of writes to the memory buffer cache.

property.name: Reads
property.summary: Gest the number of page reads.

property.name: Writes
property.summary: Gest the number of page writes.

property.name: BackoutCount
property.summary: Gest the number of removals of a version of a record.

property.name: DeleteCount
property.summary: Gest the number of database deletes since the database was last attached.

property.name: ExpungeCount
property.summary: Gest the number of removals of a record and all of its ancestors, for records hose deletions have been committed.

property.name: InsertCount
property.summary: Gest the number of inserts into the database since the database was last attached.

property.name: PurgeCount
property.summary: Gest the number of removals of old versions of fully mature records.

property.name: ReadIdxCount
property.summary: Gest the number of reads done via an index since the database was last attached.

property.name: ReadSeqCount
property.summary: Gest the number of sequential sequential table scans (row reads) done on each table since the database was last attached.

property.name: UpdateCount
property.summary: Gest the number of database updates since the database was last attached.

property.name: DatabaseSizeInPages
property.summary: Gest the database size in pages.

property.name: OldestTransaction
property.summary: Gest the number of the oldest transaction.

property.name: OldestActiveTransaction
property.summary: Gest the number of the oldest active transaction.

property.name: OldestActiveSnapshot
property.summary: Gest the number of the oldest snapshot transaction.

property.name: NextTransaction
property.summary: Gest the number of the next transction.

property.name: ActiveTransactions
property.summary: Gest the number of active transction.
